title: Odd characters that seem to be related to formatting are outputted
body:
I'm using mssysgit to run phpunit.
I have mssysgit version 1.7.11-preview20120620 .
I have PHPUnit v.3.7.10.
My OS is Windows 6.1 x64.
I believe I have, but I'm not sure, all dependencies of phpunit (at least it runs without errors).

If I run: `ls -l --color` all colors appear in its proper way, without those kinds of characters.

Here's an example of command and output (I emptied the *.xml.dist so that it wouldn't fill this with test results):

```
$ phpunit
PHPUnit 3.7.10 by Sebastian Bergmann.

Configuration read from [deleted]

Time: 0 seconds, Memory: 18.50Mb

←[30;43m←[2KNo tests executed!
←[0m←[2K
```

Here's also an excerpt of a unit test:

```
$ phpunit
PHPUnit 3.7.10 by Sebastian Bergmann.

Configuration read from [deleted]

←[33;1mI←[0m.....←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m........................←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m.......←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m   61 / 1435 (  4%)
←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36;1mS←[0m←[36
```

And it doesn't matter if I use the --colors option or not. The output is the same.

I already tried to search for many keywords, including 'phpunit wierd characters' and 'phpunit "←[30;43m←[2K"' in google but returned an answer to me in the first 2 pages of each search (when they existed).
